description.en: Practising the analysing data and interpreting the results. Peer assessment of the drafts of Master's theses. Preparation of a presentation introducing a Master's thesis and presenting the Master's thesis.
description.et: Andmete analüüsimise ja tulemuste interpreteerimise harjutamine. Magistritöö mustandite vastastikhindamine. Magistritööd tutvustava esitluse koostamine ja magistritöö esitlemine.

objectives.en: To develop a skill to analyse the data collected for the Master's thesis, to present, critically evaluate and interpret the results. To develop a skill to present one's own Master's thesis orally.
objectives.et: Arendada oskust magistritööks kogutud andmeid analüüsida, tulemusi esitada, kriitiliselt hinnata ja interpreteerida. Arendada oskust magistritööd suuliselt esitleda.

learning_outcomes.en: The student who has completed the course:
- is able to analyse the data collected for the Master's thesis;
- is able to present, critically evaluate and interpret the results of the Master's thesis;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab magistritöö tulemusi esitada, kriitiliselt hinnata ja interpreteerida;

learning_outcomes.en: - is able to defend their Master's thesis orally.
